AI and Tech Developments.text: Big Pharmai launches the first AI Agent built on the BADDIE framework to celebrate reaching 20k followers.
Mind AI partners with Eliza OS AI to enhance AI capabilities in processing social signals and market dynamics.
AI Agent APIs are now live on Fleek, allowing easy deployment, updating, and control of AI agents.
Nillion Network unveils a partnership that extends powerful capabilities for AI agents.
Reality Spiral announces the soft launch of a new UI for interacting with agents.

AI and Venture Capital Show.text: A new game show combining AI and venture capital is in the works, with a trailer released today and a demo coming tomorrow.
